segments.text: What kind of character do you think you have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Generally speaking , l am an open-minded person .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How would your friends or colleagues describe you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They say Mr . Sun is a friendly , sensitive , caring and determined person .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I admire a person who is honest , flexible and easy-going .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you get along with others ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I get on well with others .
segments.speaker: S2
